entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 this morning then southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
